title:u/pandapaxxy's Returning (in Season of the Dawn) weapons controller breakdown
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/eazaru/returning_weapons_controller_breakdown/

// The Old Fashioned (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "For PvP Old Fashioned unfortunately doesn’t have anything stellar." Recommended MW: Range or Stability.

// Hawthorne's Field-Forged Shotgun (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "In PvP if you want to use a Lightweight shotgun you’re going for one of two different builds, a decent OHK distance (won’t beat a precision frame or aggressive frame), or a great two tap shotgun." Recommended MW: Range.
dimwishlist:item=1807343361&perks=1047830412,3142289711,2117683199,47981717
dimwishlist:item=1807343361&perks=1332244541,3142289711,2117683199,47981717
dimwishlist:item=1807343361&perks=1047830412,3142289711,1631667848,47981717

// Elatha FR4 (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "Where I think this gun will shine is PvP. If the gunsmith hasn’t been kind to you, or you never got to do Menagerie before it was patched then this could definitely make up for lost time." Recommended MW: Range or Stability.
dimwishlist:item=4106983932&perks=1628165636,2969185026,280464955,1600092898

// Jack Queen King 3 (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "Having better base stats than a Waking Vigil almost across the board will mean god rolls of this gun will see much more play. Unfortunately Waking Vigil will take the cake for best trait perks of Opening Shot and Slideshot." Recommended MW: Range or Stability.
dimwishlist:item=410996590&perks=1926090093,1885400500,3523296417,4082225868
dimwishlist:item=410996590&perks=1926090090,1885400500,3523296417,4082225868

// Infinite Paths 8 (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "Steady Rounds, Moving Target, and Eye of the Storm or Zen Moment will be an insanely sticky and reliable pulse. I want to try and get that roll just to see what near 100% stability just feels like." Recommended MW: Stability.
dimwishlist:item=3233390913&perks=839105230,3177308360,3523296417,699525795
